content: I got an email from https://kompar.tools/ suggesting we submit ourselves to their list of static analysis tooling; I haven't really looked into it but I forwarded the mail to y'all, interested in thoughts!

I got the same email. On their list there are some well known linters, like ESLint, pylint, checkstyle, clang-tidy, ... I don't think it would hurt to add Clippy to the list. My only concern is, that we might have to maintain it. Not sure how much work that is though.
